name: ColorShape QuadraChroma
description: Surround yourself on all four sides with each of four colors: red, green, blue, and yellow before the time runs out. Use A/D to rotate counter clockwise and clockwise respectively. Use the arrow keys to change direction. This is an entry for the #minijam Mini Jam 52: Summit. Try and reach the summit by surrounding yourself on all four sides with each color as quickly as possible.
